'''CU59''' is a version of ''[[Xbox One Edition]]'' released on April 9, 2024.<ref>{{ytl|iiSNEAxEYu0|New Console Edition Update in 2024!?|toycat|April 9, 2024}}</ref> This version was released more than 4 years after the previous update to ''Xbox One Edition''.

== Changes ==
* Removed the "Download the latest version of Minecraft for FREE!" button from the options menu.{{verify}}
* Reset any [[skin]]s that players had selected as their favorite but did not own.
* Updated all [[splash]]es to match with {{BE}}.
